text:
When you use a php file in the ErrorDocuement path with php 5.1.0 on WinXP,
Apache will crash with XP's "The program has crashed" error.

For example:
ErrorDocument 404 /error/error.php?err=404

When you restart the server and access it, you'll get the crash message.

Report says: Apache.exe 2.0.54.0 crashed in module php5ts.dll 5.1.0.0, offset
changes.
